mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrSnsCnrsHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , SNS_CNRS_DATE , CNRS_SNS_CD , CNRS_URL , MALL_ID , PROMT_SN , EVT_NO , STRND_SN , GOD_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_SNS_CNRS_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SNS_CNRS_DATE = #{snsCnrsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
